update SHCPE_DEAL set MSG_ID = #{msgId,jdbcType=CHAR}, TRD_DIR = #{trdDir,jdbcType=CHAR}, MSG_TYPE = #{msgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QUOTE_ID = #{quoteId,jdbcType=CHAR}, MSG_STATUS = #{msgStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, ERROR_REASON = #{errorReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRD_STATUS = #{trdStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEAL_ID = #{dealId,jdbcType=CHAR}, XML_ID = #{xmlId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select XML_INFO from SHCPE_XML_DETAIL where XML_ID = (select distinct XML_ID from SHCPE_DEAL where QUOTE_ID = #{arg0} and MSY_TYPE = #{arg1} order by UPDATE_TIME desc limit 1)
